item.title: AMD unveils 5th Gen Epyc embedded processors for networking, storage and industrial edge
item.description: AMD announced the expansion of its x86 embedded processor portfolio with the introduction of 5th Gen AMD Epyc Embedded processors.

item.title: Altera launches Agilex 3 FPGAs for the intelligent edge
item.description: Altera is launching its latest family of Agilex FPGA chips to help developers expand the boundaries of the intelligent edge.

item.title: GenLayer offers novel approach for AI agent transactions: getting multiple LLMs to vote on a suitable contract
item.description: GenLayer is betting that AI-driven contracts, enforced on the blockchain, will be the foundation for a trillion-dollar marketplace.

item.title: Major AI market share shift revealed: DALL-E plummets 80% as Black Forest Labs dominates 2025 data
item.description: New data reveals dramatic AI market share shifts in 2025 as Black Forest Labs and DeepSeek challenge OpenAI and Google's dominance.

item.title: What you need to know about Manus, the new AI agentic system from China hailed as a second ‘DeepSeek moment’
item.description: Manus AI is designed as a multi-agent system, meaning it combines several AI models to handle tasks independently.
